metadata.dc:author: Arrizabalaga Moreno, Mariano
Mora Durbán, Miguel
Navarro Sebastián, Javier
Mañas Pelillo, Antonio
Salinas Casado, Jesús
Díez Rodríguez, Jesús María
metadata.dc:description: OBJECTIVES To review the role of cerebellum on the lower urinary tract dynamics. METHODS Anatomic-functional methodology including structural, functional and neurotransmitters study. RESULTS We describe the complex connections of the cerebellum and its influence on the lower urinary tract function. CONCLUSIONS It is surprising the functional relationship between cerebellum and lower urinary tract, playing a inhibitory modulating role during the filling phase and facilitating the voiding phase.
metadata.dc:title: Cerebelo y tracto urinario inferior.
[Cerebellum and lower urinary tract].
